title: [综合]Bukkit2Sponge —— 水桶2海绵？让bukkit端支持sponge插件[1.8.8-1.11]
author: _DIM_
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 17:50 编辑 

介绍
Bukkit2Sponge是一个可以让Bukkit服务器中加载SpongeAPI插件，代替运行成熟的Sponge和SpongeVanilla服务器的第三方插件
警告：此插件很不完整。在0.01，只有简单的插件测试工作

原贴内容：
Bukkit2Sponge allows loading SpongeAPI plugins on Bukkit servers. An unofficial alternative to running the fully-fledged Spongeor SpongeVanilla servers.

Warning: very incomplete (bug reports and pull requests appreciated, see issues for implementation progress). As of 0.0.1, only simple test plugins work.


用法
复制该插件到你bukkit服务端的plugins文件夹
运行你的服务器，他会自动建立一个plugins/Bukkit2Sponge/plugins/ 目录
如果使用Glowstone++服务端，你可以直接把Sponge插件放到 plugins文件夹里，他同样会直接加载到Bukkit2Sponge（226+版本）
在启动服务器时，如果配置正确，Bukkit2Sponge应会记录Sponge插件（在控制台里）
17:52:00 [INFO] [Bukkit2Sponge] Loadingplugins...
17:52:00 [INFO] [Bukkit2Sponge] Initializing 2SpongeAPI plugins...

原贴内容：
Copy the plugin jar to the plugins directory of your Bukkit server.
Run your server, the first time it will create a plugins/Bukkit2Sponge/plugins/ directory. You can place your SpongeAPI plugins here.
If using the Glowstone++server, you can alternatively place the SpongeAPI plugins in the top-level plugins/ directory and they will be loaded by Bukkit2Sponge as well (requires build 226+).
When starting the server, if configured correctly Bukkit2Sponge should log the SpongeAPI plugins it finds:
17:52:00 [INFO] [Bukkit2Sponge] Loading plugins...
17:52:00 [INFO] [Bukkit2Sponge] Initializing 2 SpongeAPI plugins...


下载地址：
上方原贴
备份：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1dFmR1XB


我赌五毛钱，这贴不会有人气收入
